meta.translationNotAvailable: Unfortunately there is no translation available for this page.
meta.translationIncomplete: Not all text on this page will be translated

home.error: Unable to retrieve items, please try again in a few moments.
home.error-too-long: This is taking longer than expected

shop.title: Current Rotation
shop.error: Shop not available, please try again in a few moments
shop.line1: The current item shop rotation for Fortnite Battle Royale - updates daily at [00:00 UTC](https://time.is/UTC|tooltip=Current time in UTC|newtab=true).
shop.line2: You can see yesterday's item shop [here](/shop/yesterday|tooltip=Yesterday's Item Shop).
shop.line3: Click a cosmetic to see more information about it.

upcoming.title: Upcoming Cosmetics
upcoming.line1: All unreleased items in Fortnite Battle Royale.

list.title: Cosmetics List
list.line1: Every cosmetic available in Fortnite Battle Royale.

list.title: Item Shop History
list.line1: Here are the last 8 days of item shop rotations for Fortnite Battle Royale.
list.line2: Click one to view full shop or scroll to view full item shop history by day.

view.title: Shop Rotation
view.line1: This is the item shop rotation of [date] for Fortnite Battle Royale.
view.line2: Click a cosmetic to see more information about it.

news.title: News
news.line1: The current in-game news feed from Epic Games. Updated every minute.
news.error: We were unable to get the news from Fortnite, we'll try again shortly.

randomiser.title: Randomiser
randomiser.line1: Pick a random outfit from every item available.

png.title: Cosmetics PNG
png.line1: Please credit back to fnbr.co if you use any of these images. Previews are scaled down, downloads will be full size.

gallery.title: Cosmetics Gallery
gallery.line1: Every cosmetic available in Fortnite Battle Royale.
gallery.line2: Please do not use these images on your personal website/social media account without direct credit to fnbr.co

icons.title: Fortnite Battle Royale Icons
icons.line1: All images belong to Epic Games.

item.has-reminders: You have reminders set for this item.
item.no-reminders: Reminders aren't available for this item.
item.interest-line1: This represents interest in this item over time, 100% being the most popular time.
item.interest-line2: Data for today may be incomplete

home.title: Your Account Data
home.error: Something went wrong loading your account data, please try again later.

info.title: Information
info.line1: You are logged in with [provider] as [username]
info.line2-api-no: You do not have api access.

migration.title: Legacy Accounts
migration.waiting-line1: We have moved to using Discord for login.
migration.waiting-line2: If you have an account from 2018, you will need to login with it to merge it with this one
migration.twitter-line1: We have moved to using Discord for login. You are currently using a legacy account which may be discontinued in the future and has limited functionality.
migration.twitter-line2: To migrate to a Discord account, click the button below

destroy.title: Destroy Account
destroy.line1: If you no longer want your account, you can delete it and all its data [here](/account/destroy)

oauth.title: Login to fnbr.co
oauth.legacy-text: Alternatively, if you have a legacy account from 2018 needing migration:
oauth.privacy-text: By logging in you agree to us storing data associated with your account as set out in our [privacy policy](/privacy).

username.title: Welcome to fnbr.co
username.line1: You are logged in with Discord, to interact with others on our site we need you to pick a username
username.nameTaken: Your username [attemptedName] is taken by another user, we have added your Discord discriminator to it and suggest you use that.
username.randomName: Your username [attemptedName] is taken by another user, we were unable to make a unique name using your Discord discriminator.
username.form-criteria: Please choose a username between 2 and 32 characters, which may contain alphanumeric characters as well as underscores and hyphens.

locked.title: Unable to login
locked.line1: You aren't able to login to fnbr.co because [your account has been locked](class=text-danger).

migrated.title: Account migrated
migrated.line1: You logged in with Twitter as
migrated.line2: However, that account has been migrated to use Discord login.

notFound.title: No Account Found
notFound.line1: You logged in with Twitter as
notFound.line2: However, that account has never logged in before and we now only support Twitter login for migration purposes.

404.title: Error
404.line1: Either the resource you requested doesn't exist, or you don't have permission to view it.

500.title: Uh oh!
500.line1: Something went wrong while processing your request, please try again later!
500.line2: You can try to login again [here](/oauth).
